item.title: How did it get so late so soon?
item.description: Another year is about to end and yet it seems it has just started. At the start of 2015, I had ambitious plans for the year. A lot of things to do, a plethora of resolutions, and a heart brimming with optimism. The year is about to conclude and I’m afraid that I’m far from my plans. I had fallen in the trap of planning fallacy. Daniel Kahneman describes planning fallacy as follows:
